title: Weekly Digest (9 June, 2019 - 16 June, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 33 issues were created.
Of these, 13 issues have been closed and 20 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #8420 [Update zh_Hans_CN.json and zh_hans.json ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8420), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:green_heart: #8418 [Fix stickers and wallet e2e tests](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8418), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #8416 [No incoming messages in group chat for recovered account (android)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8416), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8415 [[WIP]add test coverage report and publish to coveralls](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8415), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:green_heart: #8414 [Can't install stickers via automation framework](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8414), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8412 [NoSuchKeyException: backgroundColor app crash when tap on 'Network Fee' (android)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8412), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #8411 [Check tribute if contact was added](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8411), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #8410 [[WIP] Render chat formatting natively](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8410), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:green_heart: #8409 [use nix shell for running fastlane ios clean](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8409), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #8408 [Signing message title overlaps phone status bar on some screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8408), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:green_heart: #8407 [upgrade react-navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8407), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8406 [No input field in 1:1 chat is shown for some of the contacts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8406), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:green_heart: #8405 [Wrong password error shown when signing typed message in Simpledapp on Mainnet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8405), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8404 [Error shown when enabling biometric auth for second account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8404), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8403 [Scan URL with QR Scanner from Chats](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8403), by [krisc](https://github.com/krisc)
:green_heart: #8401 [No quote is shown on nightly build if reply is sent from 0.13.0 release build ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8401), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:green_heart: #8400 [[mobile] switch to png icons](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8400), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8399 [Use react-native-fast-image for remote images](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8399), by [shamardy](https://github.com/shamardy)
:green_heart: #8397 [Noticible delay of 6th+ message appearance on chat view if they fit the screen after navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8397), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #8395 [Black bar overlaps the bottom tab panel [on iPad Pro]](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8395), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #8422 [Update zh_Hans_CN.json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8422), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:heart: #8421 [Update zh_hans.json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8421), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:heart: #8419 [upgrade fastlane: 2.121.1 > 2.125.2](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8419), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8417 [don't pass any arguments to getVersion](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8417), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8413 [fix node_modules permissions before git clean](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8413), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8402 [Minor fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8402), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #8398 [add NIX_KEEP to add --keep to pyre nix shell](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8398), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8396 [prevent showing error dialog on code loading](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8396), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #8394 [[perf] prod version of slurp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8394), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #8393 [[perf] extensions module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8393), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #8392 [[perf] network module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8392), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #8391 [Where can i get a apk？](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8391), by [mivanzhang](https://github.com/mivanzhang)
:heart: #8390 [[perf] Minimize com.taoensso/timbre dependencies](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8390), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #8407 [upgrade react-navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8407), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #8410 [[WIP] Render chat formatting natively](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8410), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
It received 50 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 32 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 15 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #8420 [Update zh_Hans_CN.json and zh_hans.json ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8420), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:yellow_heart: #8418 [Fix stickers and wallet e2e tests](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8418), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:yellow_heart: #8415 [[WIP]add test coverage report and publish to coveralls](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8415), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #8411 [Check tribute if contact was added](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8411), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #8410 [[WIP] Render chat formatting natively](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8410), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:yellow_heart: #8409 [use nix shell for running fastlane ios clean](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8409), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #8407 [upgrade react-navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8407), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #8403 [Scan URL with QR Scanner from Chats](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8403), by [krisc](https://github.com/krisc)
:yellow_heart: #8400 [[mobile] switch to png icons](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8400), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #8363 [Partitioned topic and topic negotiation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8363), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:yellow_heart: #8327 [WIP Scan invalid qr-code and dismiss error with no redirect](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8327), by [krisc](https://github.com/krisc)
:yellow_heart: #8326 [don't exclude arm64-v8a libraries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8326), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #8317 [[Fixes #8066] Added native ENS registration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8317), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:yellow_heart: #8234 [Feature/onboarding setup](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8234), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #7479 [[WIP] Change App ID for PR builds of iOS app](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7479), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 17 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #8419 [upgrade fastlane: 2.121.1 > 2.125.2](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8419), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8417 [don't pass any arguments to getVersion](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8417), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8413 [fix node_modules permissions before git clean](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8413), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8402 [Minor fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8402), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:purple_heart: #8398 [add NIX_KEEP to add --keep to pyre nix shell](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8398), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8396 [prevent showing error dialog on code loading](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8396), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8394 [[perf] prod version of slurp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8394), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8393 [[perf] extensions module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8393), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8392 [[perf] network module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8392), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8390 [[perf] Minimize com.taoensso/timbre dependencies](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8390), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8380 [run checks and build steps in parallel](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8380), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8379 [[fix #8375] "save password" unavailable for non bioauth devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8379), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:purple_heart: #8369 [Use `initialNumToRender` property + simplify our messaging FlatList.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8369), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:purple_heart: #8361 [[#8026] [Wallet] Signing transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8361), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #8360 [Move goog.i18n deps to a module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8360), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8331 [DIVIDE APK SIZE BY 2 IN 2 LINES YOU WON'T BELIEVE THAT ONE TRICK ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8331), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8229 [[7105] Feature - Adding error for a field defined with range](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8229), by [alexanmtz](https://github.com/alexanmtz)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 22 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade fastlane: 2.121.1 > 2.125.2  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c26572653f75e76292678a4aa0d625c401d936d2) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [don't pass any arguments to getVersion  ab11a67c96 removed the argument but didn't clean this call  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5cf112e8a5eff311599c7323dab7ea55212887d4) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix node_modules permissions before git clean  this is due to copying node_modules from nix store which is read-only  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1a4763c48df50830a72f4a04f1cc3c83a3fed07d) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Upgrade Xcode requirement to 10.2.1  Signed-off-by: Pedro Pombeiro <pombeirp@users.noreply.github.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/79db8e51077334a7f729d90d886884f0a32403f9) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Minor fixes in Nix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c18e2f8a093c3e76f0588e664175162fe135d16b) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Ensure watchman watch is removed after Jenkins build](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f5be5c3a69967dadb8bd9ad0295269bca6143084) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] extensions module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7097de6e051771910ca7a96c28aca66b02879859) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] network module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/908f730b1d91167e2ab727994022e690689520cc) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Use `initialNumToRender` property + simplify our messaging FlatList.  see https://facebook.github.io/react-native/docs/flatlist#initialnumtorender  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2204ad5142c21e4eac6809559787bc33a3e0bcd3) by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:hammer_and_wrench: [adding error for a field defined with range that is out of range on extensions  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/287e09747148c9454b1dd4f46c5e3b0927c1a971) by [alexanmtz](https://github.com/alexanmtz)
:hammer_and_wrench: [More e2e fixes  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f3aa376d167ed7d7dd5073b83f641cba7f861b03) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d1b991f6561968df5c360864e128b1f1a1aaca3d) by [antdanchenko](https://github.com/antdanchenko)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8026] [Wallet] Sign transaction module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7de2941f26bbfaa4f5948f32dd2ffa4409e1bdcc) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [drop x86 and x86_64 for non-e2e or dev builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/eb4ba4c50e5a6d883719f7a743b13a246cd466e3) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] prod version of slurp  All resources loaded by slurp are moved to status-modules/resources dir in release builds and are loaded only by demand instead of being bundled into index.*.js.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e925b2dc46e5f1ef2905f3272765ae351299f616) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix load of github groovy module  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7c1df4f3cdf659aab004c3eb4a0d72fe2b52b389) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix #8375] unavailable for non bioauth devices  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/66dafaef250167c7dc75026c1db58760e4735c40) by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [run checks and build steps in parallel  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/49d5a3082e6c75c8af0845e6c8e50ac1bc10af21) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [prevent showing error dialog and code loading](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9f8ab373f816da120e0e3121596ae735b5b9cdbd) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] move goog.i18n deps to a module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3bd0947b4c5616c08a175f1651bf09317854a33b) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [add NIX_KEEP to add --keep to pyre nix shell  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0e7f73fd11e396c5e5fa898178d3872eb676f234) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] Minimize com.taoensso/timbre dependencies](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/cdae3423bcc986d9a390de0a5479cfa4c005c121) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)

# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
